summary: Iteration 14 - Supply Chain Alert Notifications Testing Complete. Backend: 21/21 tests passed (100%). All 8 new alert API endpoints working correctly. Frontend: AlertsPanel component properly implemented in SupplyChainHub with Alerts tab between Control Tower and Event Markets. Note: Supply Chain feature requires authentication - not accessible in Demo Mode.

issues: Supply Chain tab not available in Demo Mode - only accessible after Google authentication

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/supply-chain/alerts/presets - Returns 6 preset alert configurations
Backend: Presets have required fields (name, description, alert_type, condition, threshold, priority, icon)
Backend: Presets have valid alert types (port_congestion, supplier_risk, geopolitical_risk, commodity_price, market_event, delivery_delay)
Backend: GET /api/supply-chain/alerts?user_id=demo_user - Returns user's alerts as list
Backend: POST /api/supply-chain/alerts - Creates new alert with success=true
Backend: Created alert has alert_id starting with 'SCA-'
Backend: Created alert has correct field values (user_id, alert_type, target_entity, entity_name, condition, threshold, priority, enabled=true)
Backend: PUT /api/supply-chain/alerts/{id} - Updates alert enabled status
Backend: PUT /api/supply-chain/alerts/{id} - Updates alert threshold
Backend: DELETE /api/supply-chain/alerts/{id} - Deletes alert with success=true
Backend: DELETE /api/supply-chain/alerts/{id} - Returns success=false for nonexistent alert
Backend: GET /api/supply-chain/alerts/history - Returns triggered alerts as list
Backend: GET /api/supply-chain/alerts/stats - Returns alert statistics
Backend: Stats have required fields (total_alerts, enabled_alerts, disabled_alerts, triggered_today, total_triggered_history)
Backend: POST /api/supply-chain/alerts/check - Checks alerts against current data
Backend: Check response has required fields (checked_at, alerts_checked, alerts_triggered, triggered)
Backend: Full alert lifecycle test (create -> get -> update -> check -> delete) passed
Frontend: AlertsPanel component has data-testid='alerts-panel'
Frontend: SupplyChainHub has data-testid='supply-chain-hub'
Frontend: Alerts tab positioned between Control Tower and Event Markets in TabsList
Frontend: AlertsPanel shows stats cards (Active Alerts, Triggered Today, Total History, Disabled)
critical_code_review_comments: AlertsPanel component well-structured with proper data-testid attributes
All 6 preset alert types properly implemented with icons and descriptions
Create Alert form has proper select dropdowns for alert_type, target_entity, condition, threshold, priority
Quick Setup presets allow one-click alert creation
Active alerts list shows enable/disable toggle and delete button
Alert system stores data IN-MEMORY only (not persisted to MongoDB) - MOCKED

success_rate.frontend: Code review passed - UI requires auth to test

mocked_apis.note: Alert system uses IN-MEMORY storage only - data not persisted to database
list: /api/supply-chain/alerts/check - Checks against simulated supply chain data

test_credentials: No auth required for backend API testing - use demo_user
context_for_next_testing_agent: Supply Chain Alert Notifications feature fully implemented. Backend has 8 new API endpoints all working correctly. Frontend AlertsPanel component added to SupplyChainHub with Alerts tab between Control Tower and Event Markets. The Supply Chain feature requires Google authentication to access - not available in Demo Mode. Alert data is stored IN-MEMORY only (not persisted to MongoDB). All 6 preset alert types implemented: Critical Port Congestion, High Supplier Risk, Geopolitical Risk Spike, Commodity Price Drop, Market Event Probability, Delivery Delay Warning.

backend_endpoints./api/supply-chain/alerts: GET - Returns user's alerts, POST - Creates new alert
backend_endpoints./api/supply-chain/alerts/{id}: PUT - Updates alert (enable/disable, threshold, priority), DELETE - Deletes alert
backend_endpoints./api/supply-chain/alerts/check: POST - Manually triggers alert check against current data

frontend_components.AlertsPanel: Main alerts panel with stats, create form, active alerts list, quick setup presets, alert history
frontend_components.Stats Cards: Active Alerts, Triggered Today, Total History, Disabled
frontend_components.Create Alert Form: Type, Entity, Condition, Threshold, Priority selects
frontend_components.Active Alerts List: Shows alerts with enable/disable toggle and delete button

supply_chain_alerts_details.status: All backend APIs working, frontend code review passed
